column5: I subscribed atleast a month ago, the funds have been taken off my mastercard, but no magazine as of yet   Any of you guys that have subscriptions receive the April/May issue yet?
ya i got the April/May 2008 one a while ago.
Frig...  funds were withdrawn on the 7th of March, you'd think I'd have a magazine by now.  Looks like I need to make a couple of phone calls.

This is why I do not subscribe to any mags.  I have found in the past that it could take up to 4 months before you saw anything and it was usually on the stand before I got it.  To top it off, only about 3/4 of the mags would show up with an automatic renewal at about the 3rd one?  I don't blame it on the mag it self, it is the distribution companies that take care of all this stuff.  Pain in the arse.
My Ontario Out of Doors arrived 2 weeks after I submitted my subscription   Lets hope the people at Musky Hunter can help me out today.
